item.title: The Best of Microsoft Sentinel — Now in Microsoft Defender
item.description:
Just over a year ago, we introduced the unified security operations (SecOps) experience within Microsoft Defender, bringing together the full stack of threat protection capabilities across” Security Incident Event Management (SIEM), Extended Detection and Response (XDR), Extended Security Posture Management (XSPM), Cloud Security, Threat Intelligence (TI), and Security Copilot. Thousands of organizations have already embraced this unified SecOps experience to streamline analyst workflows, enhance operational efficiency, and accelerate incident response across their security environments.
